## MessageBar.remove() method

Removes the given message for the given player.

**Signature:**

```typescript
remove(row: MessageRow, player: Player): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  row | [MessageRow](./bge-core.messagerow.md) | A previously-added message, as returned by <code>add()</code> or <code>set()</code>. |
|  player | [Player](./bge-core.player.md) | Player to remove a message for. |

**Returns:**

void
